mapper.sql: ID, MEMBERID, COVER, TITLE, INTRODUCTION, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, INPUT_TIME, INPUT_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER
mapper.select: select a.ID, a.MEMBERID, a.COVER, a.TITLE, a.INTRODUCTION, a.BEGIN_TIME, a.END_TIME, a.INPUT_TIME, a.INPUT_USER, a.UPDATE_TIME, a.UPDATE_USER, a.CONTENT, m.NAME from activity a LEFT JOIN member m on m.ID = a.MEMBERID

select a.ID, a.MEMBERID, a.COVER, a.TITLE, a.INTRODUCTION, a.BEGIN_TIME, a.END_TIME, a.INPUT_TIME, a.INPUT_USER, a.UPDATE_TIME, a.UPDATE_USER, a.CONTENT, m.NAME from activity a LEFT JOIN member m on m.ID = a.MEMBERID WHERE a.BEGIN_TIME <= #{now,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND a.END_TIME >= #{now,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select a.ID, a.MEMBERID, a.COVER, a.TITLE, a.INTRODUCTION, a.BEGIN_TIME, a.END_TIME, a.INPUT_TIME, a.INPUT_USER, a.UPDATE_TIME, a.UPDATE_USER, a.CONTENT, m.NAME from activity a LEFT JOIN member m on m.ID = a.MEMBERID WHERE a.END_TIME < #{now,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.insert:
insert into activity
ID,
MEMBERID,
COVER,
TITLE,
INTRODUCTION,
BEGIN_TIME,
END_TIME,
INPUT_TIME,
INPUT_USER,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_USER,
CONTENT,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{inputUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update activity
MEMBERID = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COVER = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTRODUCTION = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INPUT_TIME = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INPUT_USER = #{inputUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity set MEMBERID = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COVER = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTRODUCTION = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INPUT_TIME = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INPUT_USER = #{inputUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity set MEMBERID = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COVER = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTRODUCTION = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INPUT_TIME = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INPUT_USER = #{inputUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
